name: Atlas Pro - B2B SaaS Theme Demo
description:
Atlas Pro is a HubSpot CMS website theme designed for SaaS products. Atlas Pro is designed to be modern, lightweight, and works as a complete drag-and-drop theme. This Figma file contains design source files for the modules available in Atlas. The global color and type settings are designed to replicate those from the theme.


For more information, live site examples, or to purchase Atlas Pro (and the full editable version of this file):

https://www.kalungi.com/atlas-clean-hubspot-theme-for-b2b-saas-software


Atlas Pro is for:

  • Early-stage SaaS Founders/CEOs that need a modern, light drag and drop website theme to support quick adjustments for their go to market
  • Marketing agencies that need a go-to theme for their SaaS clients (volume discounts available)
